name: Baal Two Handed Sword, 140cm
description: When you hold the Baal latex two hands sword for the first time you feel the rush of adrenalin from 140cm of greatness. This blade is sure to impress even the most skilled warrior on the battle field.  The leather grip extends onto the lower blade allowing you to grip the weapon and use it as a defensive weapon when needed.

name: Two Handed Great Sword, 140cm
description: The ever impressive two handed latex sword the perfect weapon for any Scottish soldier. 140cm.  A tapered blade and simple cross guard is what makes this weapon easy to use and wonderful to look at.

name: Claymore Two Handed Sword, 140cm
description: This 2 handed latex claymore  sword is so named because of the traditional Scottish claymore style hilt found on any battlefield. The hollow cloverleaf pattern hilt enhances the beauty of this once great sword, its long straight beveled blade is balance by the large simple pommel at the end of the Grip. 140cm

name: Nodachi Two Handed Sword, 140cm
description: The Nodachi latex sword is a formidable weapon for any valiant Samurai to wield.  Its hand woven leather grip assures comfort and elegance.  At 140cm this long blade will strike fear in your enemies!
